import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import NavBar from '../../components/NavBar'; import AdCarousel from '../../components/AdCarousel'; import ProductCard from '../../components/ProductCard'; import Footer from '../../components/Footer/Footer'; import './Home.css'; import { Col, Row, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { homeService } from '../../services'; function HomePage() { const [category, setCategory] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setLoading(true); homeService.viewCategory("cosmetics") .then( products => { setCategory(products) setLoading(false); }, error => { console.log(error); setLoading(false); } ); }, []) return (
